review: Dr.Durga is one of the most dedicated doctors that I have ever seen. Thanks to her timely help for treating my Father through various health issues including Viral Pneumonia , Covid and Liver complications. As well as quality of care, the assurance and information that she provides in a simplified manner are very helpful.  She also makes sure that she follows up on her patients and checks to see that the treatment is working. One of the most approachable and reliable human beings that we are extremely indebted to.

Dr Durga is friendly, professional and very caring. She takes time to listen and understand the concerns and she explains very clearly and openly about the treatment. She is reliable and (very much) accessible in case of emergency situations or urgent queries.

Thank you Dr for your great service and care.

Dr Durga is an angel in disguise. I am type 1 diabetic and she has helped me control my diabetic.  I also went to her with sever chest infection and cough.  Her treatment has totally cured  me.  
I had an accident and fell from the first floor to the ground floor.  The trauma I would have suffered was literally no because of the words and encouragement by Dr.  Durga and my trust in her was literally a miracle.  
I wish and hope we have more dedicated Doctors like her who would pick the call at any time and rush to help irrespective of the time. 
I am very grateful and obliged to her. Thank you Dr.  Durga for everything.

A friendly Doctor indeed who patiently listened to my doubts.
Thanks for her advices and prescriptions given on medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very professional but friendly. Understood the issue. Understood my previous medication. Provided appropriate changes and prescription
